'''Ride the Lightning''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to defeat a [[Kairagi: Dancing Thunder]] while their weapon is infused with Electro.

==Trivia==
* Ride the Lightning is a reference to a {{w|Metallica}} song and {{w|Ride the Lightning|studio album}} of the same name.
** [[Fight Fire With Fire]], the [[Kairagi: Fiery Might]] version of this achievement, is a song appears on the same studio album.
